dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] content]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, November 28, 2005 3:00 PM
To: staff@3arabia.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] content]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] content
Date: Fri, 25 Nov 2005 17:52:18 -0600
From: staff@3arabia.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: legal-response@theplanet.com


dear sir

the following site is hosted on your server and for the past few month they
hav been using our content and alteing them and removiung our names from the
images

we have tried to contect them to either keep our name on the matriel which
they use or to stop and remove all of images

we have a legal agreement with many of the artist which provide us the
content

we hope that you do some action with me and I can name few other sites which
they ara having provlem with this site "regarding the matriel stealing"

one more thins we need the person name and his contact info just in case if
you fail to do anything

here is an example of the images

http://pics.eftekasat.net/details.php?image_id=71256&sessionid=313afb8c6457d
b7586628c864b5ea3fb&sessionid=313afb8c6457db7586628c864b5ea3fb

http://pics.eftekasat.net/details.php?image_id=71255&sessionid=313afb8c6457d
b7586628c864b5ea3fb&sessionid=313afb8c6457db7586628c864b5ea3fb

and here is our links to the orginal
http://www.3arabiaphoto.com/singers/Arabic_Singers_Female/dana/high_photo-00
1.html


thanks for your time

alex newman


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
